databaseConfig.sql: SELECT SUM_KANRI_NO , SINSEI_KANRI_NO , SUBSYSTEM_CD , GYOMU_CD , TRHK_CD , SYORI_CD , KISY_CD , DATAMK_TNTSY_CD , FUNE_NO , TNTSY_CD , TATESK_CD , TATESK_TNTSY_CD , KEIJO_YMD , KIN_YOTEI_YMD , TRHKSK_CD , TRHKSK_TNTSY_CD , TUKA_CD , KIHON_TEKIYO , SEIKYU_YMD , SYONIN_PATTERN_CD , LINE_NO , KEIYAKU_NO , FUND_KBN , HIMOKU_KBN , KANJO_KMK_CD , UTIWAKE_KMK_CD , AITE_KANJO_KMK_CD , AITE_UTIWAKE_KMK_CD , SYHZ_CD , GAK , SYOHIZEI_GAK , MEISAI_TEKIYO , SURYO , TANKA , TANI , HSI_KIKAN_FROM , HSI_KIKAN_TO , CREATE_DATE , TRKM_TNTSY_CD , TRKM_DATE , OPE_NO , KIKAN_KISY_CD , KIKAN_SINSEI_NO , KIKAN_MEISAI_NO , SYORI_STATUS , STATUS_REMARK , EXT_SYSTEM_CD , UPDPGMID , UPDUSERID , UPDDATE_YMDHMS FROM TAJSINSEIIF

SELECT SUM_KANRI_NO , SINSEI_KANRI_NO , SUBSYSTEM_CD , GYOMU_CD , TRHK_CD , SYORI_CD , KISY_CD , DATAMK_TNTSY_CD , FUNE_NO , TNTSY_CD , TATESK_CD , TATESK_TNTSY_CD , KEIJO_YMD , KIN_YOTEI_YMD , TRHKSK_CD , TRHKSK_TNTSY_CD , TUKA_CD , KIHON_TEKIYO , SEIKYU_YMD , SYONIN_PATTERN_CD , LINE_NO , KEIYAKU_NO , FUND_KBN , HIMOKU_KBN , KANJO_KMK_CD , UTIWAKE_KMK_CD , AITE_KANJO_KMK_CD , AITE_UTIWAKE_KMK_CD , SYHZ_CD , GAK , SYOHIZEI_GAK , MEISAI_TEKIYO , SURYO , TANKA , TANI , HSI_KIKAN_FROM , HSI_KIKAN_TO , CREATE_DATE , TRKM_TNTSY_CD , TRKM_DATE , OPE_NO , KIKAN_KISY_CD , KIKAN_SINSEI_NO , KIKAN_MEISAI_NO , SYORI_STATUS , STATUS_REMARK , EXT_SYSTEM_CD , UPDPGMID , UPDUSERID , UPDDATE_YMDHMS FROM TAJSINSEIIF WHERE SUM_KANRI_NO = :SUM_KANRI_NO AND SINSEI_KANRI_NO = :SINSEI_KANRI_NO AND SUBSYSTEM_CD = :SUBSYSTEM_CD AND GYOMU_CD = :GYOMU_CD AND TRHK_CD = :TRHK_CD AND SYORI_CD = :SYORI_CD AND LINE_NO = :LINE_NO AND EXT_SYSTEM_CD = :EXT_SYSTEM_CD

INSERT INTO TAJSINSEIIF ( SUM_KANRI_NO , SINSEI_KANRI_NO , SUBSYSTEM_CD , GYOMU_CD , TRHK_CD , SYORI_CD , KISY_CD , DATAMK_TNTSY_CD , FUNE_NO , TNTSY_CD , TATESK_CD , TATESK_TNTSY_CD , KEIJO_YMD , KIN_YOTEI_YMD , TRHKSK_CD , TRHKSK_TNTSY_CD , TUKA_CD , KIHON_TEKIYO , SEIKYU_YMD , SYONIN_PATTERN_CD , LINE_NO , KEIYAKU_NO , FUND_KBN , HIMOKU_KBN , KANJO_KMK_CD , UTIWAKE_KMK_CD , AITE_KANJO_KMK_CD , AITE_UTIWAKE_KMK_CD , SYHZ_CD , GAK , SYOHIZEI_GAK , MEISAI_TEKIYO , SURYO , TANKA , TANI , HSI_KIKAN_FROM , HSI_KIKAN_TO , CREATE_DATE , TRKM_TNTSY_CD , TRKM_DATE , OPE_NO , KIKAN_KISY_CD , KIKAN_SINSEI_NO , KIKAN_MEISAI_NO , SYORI_STATUS , STATUS_REMARK , EXT_SYSTEM_CD , UPDPGMID , UPDUSERID , UPDDATE_YMDHMS ) VALUES ( :SUM_KANRI_NO , :SINSEI_KANRI_NO , :SUBSYSTEM_CD , :GYOMU_CD , :TRHK_CD , :SYORI_CD , :KISY_CD , :DATAMK_TNTSY_CD , :FUNE_NO , :TNTSY_CD , :TATESK_CD , :TATESK_TNTSY_CD , :KEIJO_YMD , :KIN_YOTEI_YMD , :TRHKSK_CD , :TRHKSK_TNTSY_CD , :TUKA_CD , :KIHON_TEKIYO , :SEIKYU_YMD , :SYONIN_PATTERN_CD , :LINE_NO , :KEIYAKU_NO , :FUND_KBN , :HIMOKU_KBN , :KANJO_KMK_CD , :UTIWAKE_KMK_CD , :AITE_KANJO_KMK_CD , :AITE_UTIWAKE_KMK_CD , :SYHZ_CD , :GAK , :SYOHIZEI_GAK , :MEISAI_TEKIYO , :SURYO , :TANKA , :TANI , :HSI_KIKAN_FROM , :HSI_KIKAN_TO , :CREATE_DATE , :TRKM_TNTSY_CD , :TRKM_DATE , :OPE_NO , :KIKAN_KISY_CD , :KIKAN_SINSEI_NO , :KIKAN_MEISAI_NO , :SYORI_STATUS , :STATUS_REMARK , :EXT_SYSTEM_CD , :UPDPGMID , :UPDUSERID , :UPDDATE_YMDHMS )
select max(SUM_KANRI_NO) as SUM_KANRI_NO from TAJSINSEIIF where SUM_KANRI_NO like :SUM_KANRI_NO
